info.title: Coinbase Non-Custodial Staking API
info.description: Staking Service is a non-custodial staking service that aims to support multiple protocols and actions on them.

400.description: The request attempted has invalid parameters

401.description: Returned if authentication information is invalid

403.description: Returned when a user does not have permission to the resource.

404.description: Returned when a resource is not found.

429.description: Returned when a resource limit has been reached.

500.description: Returned when an internal server error happens.

parameters.name: parent
pageSize
parameters.description:
The maximum number of validators to return. The service may
return fewer than this value.

If unspecified, 50 validators will be returned.
The maximum value is 1000; values over 1000 will be floored to 1000.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description:
A page token as part of the response of a previous call.
Provide this to retrieve the next page.

When paginating, all other parameters must match the previous
request to list resources.

parameters.name: parent
filter
parameters.description:
[AIP-160](https://google.aip.dev/160) filter
Supported fields:
- string delegator_address: "0x..."
- string validator_address: "0x..."
- string action: "stake", "unstake"
- string protocol: "polygon"
- string network: "testnet", "mainnet"
- string amount: "10000"
- string currency: "MATIC"

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description:
The maximum number of workflows to return. The service may
return fewer than this value.

If unspecified, 50 workflows will be returned.
The maximum value is 1000; values over 1000 will be floored to 1000.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description:
A page token as part of the response of a previous call.
Provide this to retrieve the next page.

When paginating, all other parameters must match the previous
request to list resources.

WaitStepOutputWaitUnit.description:
- WAIT_UNIT_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified wait time
 - WAIT_UNIT_SECONDS: Wait time measured in seconds
 - WAIT_UNIT_BLOCKS: Wait time measured in blocks
 - WAIT_UNIT_EPOCHS: Wait time measured in epochs
 - WAIT_UNIT_CHECKPOINTS: Wait time measured in checkpoints
WaitStepOutputWaitUnit.title: The unit of wait time

v1alpha1Action.title:
An Action resource, which represents an action you may take on a network,
posted to a validator. (i.e. stake, unstake)

value.description: The total value of the token.

v1alpha1Amount.description:
The amount of a token you wish to perform an action
with.

stakerAddress.description: The address you wish to claim rewards for.

integratorContractAddress.title: The address of the integrator contract

v1alpha1EthereumKilnClaimRewardsParamete.description: The parameters required for the claim rewards action on Ethereum Kiln.
v1alpha1EthereumKilnClaimRewardsParamete.title: EthereumKiln: Claim Rewards Parameters

stakerAddress.description: The address you wish to stake from.

integratorContractAddress.title: The address of the integrator contract

amount.description: The amount of Ethereum to stake in wei.

v1alpha1EthereumKilnStakeParameters.description: The parameters required for the stake action on Ethereum Kiln.
v1alpha1EthereumKilnStakeParameters.title: EthereumKiln: Stake Parameters

ethereumBalance.title: The Ethereum balance of the address

integratorShareBalance.description: The number of integrator shares owned by the address.

integratorShareUnderlyingBalance.description: The total Ethereum you can exchange for your integrator shares.

totalExitableEth.description: The total amount of Ethereum you can redeem for all non-claimed vPool shares.

totalSharesPendingExit.description: The number of vPool shares are eligible to receive now or at a later point in time.

fulfillableShareCount.description: The number of vPool shares you are able to claim now.

v1alpha1EthereumKilnStakingContextDetail.description: The protocol specific details for an Ethereum Kiln staking context.

v1alpha1EthereumKilnStakingContextParame.description: The protocol specific parameters required for fetching a staking context.
v1alpha1EthereumKilnStakingContextParame.title: EthereumKiln: Staking Context Parameters

stakeParameters.description: The parameters for stake action on Ethereum Kiln.

unstakeParameters.description: The parameters for unstake action on Ethereum Kiln.

claimRewardsParameters.description: The parameters for claim rewards action on Ethereum Kiln.

v1alpha1EthereumKilnStakingParameters.description: The parameters needed for staking on Ethereum via Kiln.
v1alpha1EthereumKilnStakingParameters.title: EthereumKiln: Staking Parameters

stakerAddress.description: The address you wish to unstake from.

integratorContractAddress.title: The address of the integrator contract

amount.description: The amount of Ethereum to unstake in wei.

v1alpha1EthereumKilnUnstakeParameters.description: The parameters required for the unstake action on Ethereum Kiln.
v1alpha1EthereumKilnUnstakeParameters.title: EthereumKiln: Unstake Parameters

nextPageToken.description:
A token which can be provided as `page_token` to retrieve the next page.
If this field is omitted, there are no additional pages.

A token which can be provided as `page_token` to retrieve the next page.
If this field is omitted, there are no additional pages.

isMainnet.description:
Represents if the network is the mainnet network
for the given protocol.

v1alpha1Network.title:
A Network resource, which represents a blockchain network.
(i.e. mainnet, testnet, etc.)

nonce.description: The blockhash stored in the nonce account.

nonceAccount.description: The address of the nonce account.

nonceAuthority.description: The address of the nonce authority. If not provided, defaults to the nonce_account_address. Signs the transaction.

v1alpha1NonceOptions.description: The parameters required to use a durable transaction nonce for Solana transactions.
v1alpha1NonceOptions.title: Solana: Nonce Options

delegatorAddress.description:
The public address of the delegator you wish to
interact with.

validatorAddress.description:
The public address of the validator you wish to
perform the action to.

v1alpha1PolygonClaimRewardsParameters.title: The parameters needed to claim rewards on Polygon.

delegatorAddress.description:
The public address of the delegator you wish to
interact with.

validatorAddress.description:
The public address of the validator you wish to
perform the action to.

v1alpha1PolygonRestakeParameters.title: The parameters needed to restake on Polygon.

delegatorAddress.description:
The public address of the delegator you wish to
interact with.

validatorAddress.description:
The public address of the validator you wish to
perform the action to.

amount.description:
The amount of the asset. For native assets or ERC-20 contracts, this is presented in terms of
atomic units (e.g., Wei for Ether) as a base-10 number.

v1alpha1PolygonStakeParameters.title: The parameters needed to stake on Polygon.

stakeParameters.title: The parameters for stake action on Polygon

unstakeParameters.title: The parameters for unstake action on Polygon

claimRewardsParameters.title: The parameters for claim rewards action on Polygon

v1alpha1PolygonStakingParameters.title: The parameters needed for staking on Polygon

delegatorAddress.description:
The public address of the delegator you wish to
interact with.

validatorAddress.description:
The public address of the validator you wish to
perform the action to.

amount.description:
The amount of the asset. For native assets or ERC-20 contracts, this is presented in terms of
atomic units (e.g., Wei for Ether) as a base-10 number.

v1alpha1PolygonUnstakeParameters.title: The parameters needed to unstake on Polygon.

v1alpha1Protocol.title: A Protocol resource (i.e. polygon, ethereum, etc.)

stakeAccountAddress.description: The address of the new stake account which will be created. This address must not already exist. Signs the transaction.

fromAddress.description: The address of the account which will fund the stake account. Pays the transaction fee. Signs the transaction.

stakeAuthority.description: The address of the account which will be granted signing authority over staking operations on the new stake account. If not provided, defaults to the from_address.

withdrawAuthority.description: The address of the account which will be granted signing authority over withdrawing inactive stake from the new stake account. If not provided, defaults to the from_address.

amount.description: The amount to fund the stake account with, in Lamports.

nonceOptions.description: The parameters required to use a durable transaction nonce for Solana transactions.

v1alpha1SolanaCreateStakeAccountParamete.description: The parameters required for the create stake account action on Solana.
v1alpha1SolanaCreateStakeAccountParamete.title: Solana: Create Stake Account Parameters

stakeAccountAddress.description: The address of the stake account which will have its stake deactivated. Stake must be currently active.

stakeAuthority.description: The address of the account which has signing authority over staking operations on the stake account. Signs the transaction.

nonceOptions.description: The parameters required to use a durable transaction nonce for Solana transactions.

v1alpha1SolanaDeactivateStakeParameters.description: The parameters required for the deactivate stake action on Solana.
v1alpha1SolanaDeactivateStakeParameters.title: Solana: Deactivate Stake Parameters

stakeAccountAddress.description: The address of the stake account which will be delegating its stake.

voteAccountAddress.description: The address of the validator's vote account to which the stake will be delegated.

stakeAuthority.description: The address of the account which has signing authority over staking operations on the stake account. Signs the transaction.

nonceOptions.description: The parameters required to use a durable transaction nonce for Solana transactions.

v1alpha1SolanaDelegateStakeParameters.description: The parameters required for the delegate stake action on Solana.
v1alpha1SolanaDelegateStakeParameters.title: Solana: Delegate Stake Parameters

stakeAccountAddress.description: The address of the stake account will be merged into and have stake added to it.

sourceStakeAccountAddress.description: The address of the source stake account which will have no longer exist after the merge.

stakeAuthority.description: The address of the account which has signing authority over staking operations on the stake account. Signs the transaction.

nonceOptions.description: The parameters required to use a durable transaction nonce for Solana transactions.

v1alpha1SolanaMergeStakeParameters.description: The parameters required for merge stake action on Solana.
v1alpha1SolanaMergeStakeParameters.title: Solana: Merge Stake Parameters

stakeAccountAddress.description: The address of the stake account will be split and have its stake removed.

newStakeAccountAddress.description: The address of the new stake account which will be created and have the stake added to it.

stakeAuthority.description: The address of the account which has signing authority over staking operations on the stake account. Signs the transaction.

amount.description: The amount of stake to split, in Lamports.

nonceOptions.description: The parameters required to use a durable transaction nonce for Solana transactions.

v1alpha1SolanaSplitStakeParameters.description: The parameters required for split stake action on Solana.
v1alpha1SolanaSplitStakeParameters.title: Solana: Split Stake Parameters

createStakeParameters.description: The parameters for create stake account action on Solana.

delegateStakeParameters.description: The parameters for delegate stake action on Solana.

deactivateStakeParameters.description: The parameters for deactivate stake action on Solana.

withdrawStakeParameters.description: The parameters for withdraw stake action on Solana.

splitStakeParameters.description: The parameters for split stake action on Solana.

mergeStakeParameters.description: The parameters for merge stake action on Solana.

stakeAccountAddress.description: The address of the stake account from which stake will be withdrawn. Stake must be currently inactive.

recipientAddress.description: The address of the recipient account which will receive the withdrawn stake.

withdrawAuthority.description: The address of the account which has signing authority over withdrawing inactive stake from the stake account. Signs the transaction.

amount.description: The amount to withdraw from the stake account, in Lamports.

nonceOptions.description: The parameters required to use a durable transaction nonce for Solana transactions.

v1alpha1SolanaWithdrawStakeParameters.description: The parameters required for the withdraw stake action on Solana.
v1alpha1SolanaWithdrawStakeParameters.title: Solana: Withdraw Stake Parameters

unsignedTx.title: The unsigned transaction which was signed in order to be broadcasted

signedTx.title: The signed transaction which was asked to be broadcasted

txHash.description: The hash of the broadcasted transaction.

state.description: The state of the transaction step.

v1alpha1TxStepOutput.description: The details of a transaction being constructed and broadcasted to the network.

v1alpha1TxStepOutputState.description:
- STATE_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified transaction state, this is for backwards compatibility.
 - STATE_NOT_CONSTRUCTED: Tx has not yet been constructed in the backend
 - STATE_CONSTRUCTED: Tx construction is over in the backend
 - STATE_PENDING_SIGNING: Tx is waiting to be signed
 - STATE_SIGNED: Tx has been signed and returned to the backend
 - STATE_BROADCASTING: Tx is being broadcasted to the network
 - STATE_CONFIRMING: Tx is waiting for confirmation
 - STATE_CONFIRMED: Tx has been confirmed to be included in a block
 - STATE_FINALIZED: Tx has been finalized
 - STATE_FAILED: Tx construction or broadcasting failed
 - STATE_SUCCESS: Tx has been successfully executed
 - STATE_CANCELING: Tx is being canceled
 - STATE_CANCELED: Tx has been canceled
 - STATE_CANCEL_FAILED: Tx cancellation failed
 - STATE_FAILED_REFRESHABLE: Tx failed but can be refreshed
 - STATE_REFRESHING: Tx is being refreshed
 - STATE_PENDING_EXT_BROADCAST: Tx is waiting to be externally broadcasted by the customer
v1alpha1TxStepOutputState.title: State defines an enumeration of states for a staking transaction

validatorAddress.description: The public address of the validator that you may perform workflow actions on.

commissionRate.title: The rate of commission for the validator

v1alpha1Validator.description:
A Validator resource, which represents an active validator
for the given protocol network which you can submit an action
to.

address.title: The address you are getting a staking context for

v1alpha1ViewStakingContextResponse.description: The response message for the ViewStakingContext request.

unit.title: The wait unit (like checkpoint, block, epoch etc)

state.description: The state of the wait step.

v1alpha1WaitStepOutput.title: The output details of a step where we wait for some kind of on-chain activity to finish like reaching a certain checkpoint, epoch or block

v1alpha1WaitStepOutputState.description:
- STATE_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified wait step state
 - STATE_NOT_STARTED: Wait step has not started
 - STATE_IN_PROGRESS: Wait step is in-progress
 - STATE_COMPLETED: Wait step completed
v1alpha1WaitStepOutputState.title: WaitStepState defines an enumeration of states for a wait step

state.title: The current state of the workflow

currentStepId.description: The index of the current step.

steps.description: The list of steps for this workflow.

createTime.title: The timestamp the workflow was created

updateTime.title: The timestamp the workflow was last updated

skipBroadcast.description: Flag to skip tx broadcast to network on behalf of the user. Use this flag if you instead prefer to broadcast signed txs on your own.

v1alpha1WorkflowState.description:
- STATE_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified workflow state, this is for backwards compatibility.
 - STATE_IN_PROGRESS: In Progress represents a workflow that is currently in progress.
 - STATE_WAITING_FOR_SIGNING: Waiting for signing represents the workflow is waiting on the consumer to sign and return the corresponding signed tx.
 - STATE_COMPLETED: Completed represents the workflow has completed.
 - STATE_FAILED: Failed represents the workflow has failed.
 - STATE_CANCELING: Canceling represents the workflow is being canceled.
 - STATE_CANCELED: Canceled represents the workflow has been canceled.
 - STATE_CANCEL_FAILED: Cancel failed represents the workflow failed to cancel.
 - STATE_FAILED_REFRESHABLE: Failed refreshable represents the workflow failed but can be refreshed.
 - STATE_WAITING_FOR_EXT_BROADCAST: Waiting for external broadcast represents the workflow is waiting for the customer to broadcast a tx and return its corresponding tx hash.
v1alpha1WorkflowState.title:
The state of a workflow
Example workflow states:
IN_PROGRESS -> WAITING_FOR_SIGNING -> IN_PROGRESS -> COMPLETED
.................................................|-> FAILED
IN_PROGRESS -> WAITING_FOR_SIGNING -> CANCELING -> CANCELED
...............................................|-> CANCEL_FAILED

name.description: The human readable name of the step.

txStepOutput.description: The tx step output (i.e. transaction metadata such as unsigned tx, signed tx etc).

waitStepOutput.title: The waiting details for any kind like how many checkpoints away for unbonding etc

v1alpha1WorkflowStep.title: The information for a step in the workflow
